cab.content: WAR CABINET.71-SECRETCirculated to War Cabinet by Secretary of Statefor India.G.T.1123.Telegram from Viceroy to Secretary of State dated21st. June, 1917.PMy%te and personal. In view of Besant affairand the agitation arising out of it I do press for anauthoritative announcement of goal. I have just receiv-ed letter fromHeston in which he says "the position isreaching a serious stage and many of my most experiencedofficers are showing anxiety. I shall keep things asquiet as possible but I do feel that the time has comew^en we all want a little help from the British Government.
